name: Peta May
text: Thanks for wearing a mask.

name: Rick Hoffman
text: The men were professional, hardworking and courteous. They tore down a shed, removed a dog pen fenced area and an old railing along the road of the property. My yard looks amazing now. These team is who I will call when I am in need of their services in the future.

resp.text: Thank you so much it was a good project glad we could help .

name: NICOLE WILLIAMS
text: They were fast, professional, and great. I will definitely recommend them. I just wish they were wearing masks. There is still a pandemic outside. Stay safe.

resp.text: Thank you Nicole !! We appreciate your business!!

name: Sharon
text: We had a specific timeframe that we needed their services and they were able to accommodate us on 2 different occasions. I definitely recommend this company.

resp.text: Thank you Sharon we really appreciate your business!!

name: Melissa Hovater
text: Drew and the guys were great! They were polite, professional, friendly, and most importantly, got the job done.

resp.text: Awesome glad they took care of y’all !! We appreciate your business

name: amy pope
text: They were very nice and took care of all my junk i needed removed at a very fair price.

resp.text: Thank Amy for your business!

name: Jason Ash
text: They provided excellent service! I am very pleased.

resp.text: Thank you Jason for your business!! We appreciate it.

name: Denise Legate
text: Whole process very easy, Derrick and his staff great to work with, would definitely recommend so easy basically just point at what needs to go and they load it up

resp.text: Hi Denise, we're happy to hear that our junk removal service was satisfactory!

name: Anthony Booth
text: They were great. Will use again.

resp.text: Thank you Anthony !! We appreciate your business

name: Brittany I
text: Very friendly and helpful. Everything was cleaned and will definitely use this company again.

resp.text: Thank you Brittany!! We appreciate your business.

name: Tyler Smith
text: Great guys. Very prompt and very efficient. You can tell these guys take pride in what they are doing.

resp.text: Thank you Tyler for your business!! We appreciate it !!

name: Gilda Brame
text:
Excellent service. Professional. Efficient
Pleasant and kind. I would highly recommend Down South Junk Removal to anyone decluttering or moving!

resp.text: Thank you Gilda we appreciate your business!

name: Andrea Echols
text: The service was great and worth every penny. Great communication, knowledgeable workers, and the price was appropriate to the service. We will use them again!

resp.text: Thank you !! We appreciate your business!!

name: Michael Johnson
text: The two men Derrick at Down South Demo & Junk Removal sent were great. They were professional, kind, and worked very hard! The process was easy dealing with Derrick. No problem getting a convenient  & prompt time for services. And pricing was upfront and reasonable. They cleared out my Mom's apartment, leaving me no work to do after. And they followed my instructions to a T! Thanks Down South! I highly recommend.

resp.text: Thank you Michael we appreciate your business!!!

name: Ellouise Cotton
text: From the initial response to us bidding farewell upon job completion, I am very impressed! Outstanding customer service, exceptional execution and remarkable efficiency have this company etched on my " tell a friend" and will call again list! Thanks guys!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your business!! We appreciate it !!

name: Becky Millican
text: I found Down south demo and junk removal on Facebook. They were professional and quick to respond to my request for a quote. And I was able to secure an appointment quickly. They were good with communicating with me —even when the recent storms were going to affect our appointment. They called us when they were on their way and were able to quickly pick up our “junk” in about 20-30 minutes. We had a Lot of stuff just cluttering up our basement including some big items like an old treadmill and a sofa that we wouldn’t have had a way to dispose of otherwise, I believe it was money well worth spent.

resp.text: Thanks Mrs.Millican we appreciate your business!!

name: ANTHONY JONES
text: These guys were awesome!! They’re very professional and very fast! The prices are very reasonable and very well worth the money. We’ll definitely be using the services again. Thank you so much!

resp.text: Thank you Anthony for your business!! We appreciate it !!

name: Brandalyn Sanders
text: Derrick is awesome. Very professional and speedy. I have the hardest time getting items removed for trash but with them it was a breeze. Thanks again

resp.text: Thank you so much Brandalyn for your business!! Hope we can continue our business relationship and keep helping y’all out !!!

name: Jazmine Benjamin
text: I got them to remove some furniture and appliances. They were very quick with communication, professional, fast at getting the furniture out, and kind. Will definitely use them again for future disposal needs. Highly recommend.

resp.text: Thank you Jazmine we appreciate your business!!

name: JamesAndEsther Price
text: These guys were literally the BEST! They went above and beyond to remove junk that was hard to reach, all over the house and in the yard, then did a thorough sweeping up of all the debris that was left. Drew and his sidekick (I don’t remember his name)  were so respectful, polite and happy to serve. They made a very difficult situation painless. I could not be happier with their service. 100% recommend!

resp.text: Thank you so much James and Esther for your business we appreciate it .

name: Jayme Moore
text: We used Down South Junk Removal to clean up a bunch of stuff getting ready to list our house. There were multiple used appliances, old furniture pieces, lumber, tin, and various other junk. Down South was able to come out on a few days notice, kept us apprised of when they would be there, and they were on time. The two gentlemen who came worked their tails of loading their 18 foot trailer to the brim (it took two and a half hours), and they never stopped. They even brought tools and broke down some of the items to be able to fit everything. Overall, the process was professional, a good value, and I would use them again.

resp.text: Thank you Jayme !!  We appreciate your business!!

name: Benjamin Hinkle
text: Awesome guys to do business with. Highly recommend Derrick, and appreciate the timeliness and value. 5 stars

resp.text: Thank you Ben !!! We appreciate your business!!

name: Jason Walker
text: The guys that were here let me know every step they were doing. They were also worried about scratching my concrete which needed a good pressure washing. I do the pressure washing so I told them the more you scratch off the less I have to do. I would recommend Down South Demo in a heartbeat.

resp.text: Thanks Jason !! We appreciate your business hopefully they scratched it up for you a little bit so you don’t have to work so much ! Haha

name: maggie miskelley
text: Derrick and Jackie were extremely helpful. They did a stand up job! I would highly recommend them. Down South Junk Removal did the job at a fraction of the price of other junk removal businesses. 10/10 would recommend!

resp.text: Thank you Maggie we appreciate your business!!

name: traci duncan
text:
I called & got a general idea of cost & they came to pick up the next week.
They were able to start at earlier time & were done quickly.
We weren’t home so when they were done they texted me pics. The yard was picked up.
They offered Venmo pay which was so easy.

resp.text: Thank you Traci !! We appreciate your business !!

name: Cathy1 Crumley6
text: They were timely and fast and did an excellent job. Both Jacky and Drew were very kind and courteous. I would highly recommend this company to anyone.

resp.text: Thank you Cathy we appreciate your business!!!

name: Matthew Beadlecomb
text: Derrick was great at communicating throughout the process. The guys who showed up to do the work were efficient and thorough. They also made sure to clean up after themselves which isn't always the case with this kind of work. Nice job guys!

resp.text: Thank you so much Matthew we appreciate your business.

name: Keli Watson
text: Derrick was very professional and timely in response to my quote for service and was able to accommodate a Sunday job (which was a major plus!). The two gentlemen who assisted us the day of the haul were on time, polo and got the job done with minimal supervision. I was thankful that when they encountered something unexpected that they reached out for clarification instead of making an assumption which could’ve led to lost files. I would definitely recommend their services.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your business Mrs.Watson !! We appreciate it !!

name: Jean Tucker
text: Scheduled for Noon- but they called to inform me that they were running overtime on a previous job- and scheduled a new arrival time. Received a call when they were on their way- upon arrival they got right down to work- quickly and efficiently! Pricing was more than fair- and the two men were polite and professional. Would use this company again!

resp.text: Thank you Jean we appreciate your business !!

name: RICHARD Johnson
text: The guys did great work at cleaning out a lot of junk at my parent’s house. They were fast and did exactly what we needed!  Derrick was great to work with, and everything happened just like he told us it would. All of the guys were very courteous, and made sure we looked at all the areas and were satisfied before they left.

resp.text: Thank you Richard we appreciate your business !!

name: John Michaels
text: Communication was prompt and clear. Crew arrived on time and were friendly, quick and professional. We will definitely use them again and recommend them to anyone. Great job!

resp.text: Thank you John for your business we appreciate it !!

name: Margaret Jones
text: I found Down South Demo on the internet! They were very professional, on time and finished the job on time. It was a very hard job to do but they were very good! I would recommend them to all my friends!

resp.text: Thank you Margaret we appreciate your business!!

name: Melissa Williams
text: These guys were amazing! They cleaned everything out and was in and out super quick! I highly recommend them!

resp.text:
Thanks you so much for
Your business!!

name: Ron Huie
text: Awesome service! They did all the work to haul out some heavy items to the truck all I had to do was point them out. I actually forgot a very large item and they came back and got if for no charge. I highly recommend Down South Demo and Junk Removal!

resp.text: Thanks Ron we appreciate your business!!!

name: Steven Sawyer
text: They did a great job! Arrived on time and quickly finished the job! Communication was great and very professional. Will DEFINITELY use again!

resp.text: Thank you Steven for your business we appreciate it !!

name: Lorie Anderson
text:
These folks are phenomenal! Being from out of state, it was difficult to know who to call and to hire. Derrick was my main point of contact and was very friendly and professional from the beginning.

The house I hired them to clean out was probably one of their worst jobs ever! The house had been sitting vacant for a few years. There was plenty of mold and mildew, garbage, furniture, and water damage from a fire somewhere in between. Mix all of this with 90 degree weather and high humidity and this job should have been one that they ran from!

The clean-up crew did a fantastic job and got the place cleaned out in a day and a half. Derrick was more than fair with his pricing and I couldn't be happier!

I highly recommend Down South Demo and Junk Removal. You will NOT be disappointed!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your business!! That’s what we are here that take of our customers and not break the bank !!

name: Matthew Mitchell
text: These guys were great and I would definitely use them again. Communicative, helpful, and personable. They went above and beyond in disposing of all of the things they found. I would absolutely recommend them to anyone for this or any other junk removal need.

resp.text: Thank you for your business!!

name: Stacey Jackson
text: Great job, very friendly. Went above and beyond!!! Would definitely recommend to everyone. We will be a repeat customer!!

resp.text: Thank you Stacey !! We appreciate your business!!

name: Caleb Cole
text: They did such an amazing job! They went above and beyond to take care of us!

resp.text: Thanks Caleb we appreciate your business!!!

name: LaShawna Wallace
text: They were very prompt and attentive. Great service.

resp.text: Thank you LaShawna we really appreciate your business!!!

name: Jeff Dennis
text: We used the service and we were VERY pleased. Courteous, professional and hauled everything we needed gone with no problems at all! I highly recommend them!

resp.text: Thank you Mr.Dennis !! We appreciate your business!!

name: Emily Overton
text: I called the number on their website and my couch I wanted removed was gone within the hour. Would highly recommend!

resp.text: Thanks Emily for your business!! We appreciate it !!

name: Escape Day spa

They came in with friendly professional attitudes accessed what needed to be done and Got the job done quickly.
Thank you

resp.text: Thank you so much for your business!!

name: Keith Chichester
text: Down South Demo and Junk Removal were awesome. The guys were on time, efficient, and very respectful. They finished the job far faster than I would have expected and prices were extremely fair. I would recommend them for anyone needing some junk hauled.

resp.text: Thank you Keith for your business we appreciate it !!

name: Cody Johnson
text: The best junk removal company! Not only did they quote me the most affordable price out there, but they actually arrived the very next morning and enthusiastically took away every single bag with no issues. Guys, they even swept up after. On-time, professional, affordable, wow.

resp.text: Thanks for your business we appreciate it !!!

name: Amy Newell
text: Very responsive to communications and very flexible with my schedule. The men were on time, professional, kind, and took care to make sure they did not hit walls/doorways as they moved items out. I highly recommend!!

resp.text: Thank you Mrs.Newell we appreciate your business!!

name: Jennifer Bryan
text: These guys are awesome! They responded to my text with minutes and we set up an appointment. They are very friendly and a job well done! I will definitely recommend them to family and friends and use them again in the future! ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

resp.text: Thank you so much Jennifer for the kind and honest review we appreciate your business!!!

name: Neil C
text: We called Down South the morning we needed a lot of furniture and other items picked up and removed. They arrived promptly as promised, were very professional, and very efficient in getting the job done. I would highly recommend.

resp.text: Thank you for your business we appreciate it !!

name: gordon ball
text: Guys arrived right time and started work immediatley. Very hard workers and never stopped moving. Great experience and I highly recommend. I will use them again in a few months!

resp.text: Thank you Mr.Ball !!

name: John Pope
text: Very professional company !  I'm certain I will be doing business with them again.  Derrick worked with me on a satisfactory meeting time and showed up right on time.  You can't beat that for service !

resp.text: Thanks Mr.Pope we appreciate your business!!!

text: Great junk removal company. Excellent service and affordable service!

text: Very professional and hard working. The job took no time at all. I will recommend.

resp.text: Thank you for your business

text: Very professional and friendly. His crew are wonerful and hardworking. Would highly recommend if you're looking for a trustworthy company to get the job done right and quickly.

resp.text: Thank you for your business we appreciate it !!

text: Derrick came out quickly to give a quote.  They worked with our budget and had our old shed removed in no time!

name: Bama Auto Glass
text: Very nice folks to work with. They done excellent work. I would use them again for sure

name: Miranda Jinright
text: Thank you Down South Demo and Junk removal for your timely service and for sending out such a professional to clear out my clutter. Derrick Cross I appreciate you! I would highly recommend you and the company to all my family and friends!

text: They removed 50 years of stuff that was ruined by water damage.  Very quick, and professional.

name: Jessica Parker
text: Best prices and honest folks! I highly recommend. I will continue business with them in the future!

name: Courtney Stewart
text: Affordable, dependable & professional.  I would highly recommend this team for your future junk removal needs!

name: Laura Kate
text: Derrick and his guys are a pleasure to work with! Great costumer service and hard workers! Would recommend them to anyone.

name: Kris Chesser
text: The owner was very professional. He gave me a price I was happy with and got it gone.
